title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 62.1 - Sales at open windows restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 62.1 - Sales at open windows restricted

State Regulations

In premises licensed to sell alcoholic beverages for
consumption on the premises, no alcoholic beverage shall be kept, sold, served
or delivered at any open window, stand or counter facing or abutting on any
street, highway or thoroughfare, except as hereinafter
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
62.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
